subject: World Series
Baseball
Citizens Bank Park (Philadelphia, Pa)
lead_paragraph: Defeat has been regular and excruciating in Philadelphia, a city which has long viewed success, not as a sign of victory, but as an ominous warning that disaster was just around the corner.
snippet: Defeat has been regular and excruciating in Philadelphia, a city which has long viewed success, not as a sign of victory, but as an ominous warning that disaster was just around the corner.
